dungeon.name: Beyond The Gate
dungeon.description:
"The time has come, Planestalkers," Grand Marshal Kaitlyn Van Sorrel addresses the assembly. "Oriana has declared war on our world, and we must respond in kind. We may not possess the power or weapons to destroy her once and for all, but we can send a message that she won't forget for another thousand years! Now, with me, to the battlefield Beyond the Gate!"

In this Dungeon, players may set themselves up in the arena however they wish. All Bosses in this dungeon have 'Multi-Attack' on all attacks.

floor.name: Monolith
floor.description: If an attack has both the Monolith and at least one ally in range, it hits an ally instead of the Monolith. The Monolith is immobile.

floor.name: Destroyer
floor.description: During ante, for every 20 HP the Destroyer has lost, it has +1 Power and +1 Priority

floor.name: Gilt Titan
floor.description: Players must start to the left of the Gilt Titan, and can never move past him. At the end of each beat, advance this boss 1 space. When advancing, he pushes back any opponents in his space. If he pushes the players off the board, they are immediately defeated. Each time he would be stunned, he moves backward one space instead of being stunned. This boss cannot be pushed off the edge of the board.

floor.name: Zone Warrior Varles
floor.description: Before the battle begins, each player removes a random style and base from the game. These two cards are not usable during the entire duel. Additionally, each time Zone Warrior Varles hits a player, that player moves his discard pile 2 back into discard pile 1. An opponent without enough cards to form an attack pair in his hand skips his turn and plays nothing.

floor.name: Protochaon
floor.description: This boss rolls additional attacks each beat until he has 4 unique attacks (ignore duplicate attacks). When it would be stunned, discard its lowest priority attack. This boss is immobile. All passive effects of its attacks, such as Stun Guard and Armor, are constant and cumulative.

floor.name: Doppelvore
floor.description: Each Doppelvore attacks seperately. After activating its own attack, the Doppelvore then performs the attack of its partner (so each one attacks twice). They share one life pool, but are stunned separately. Each has all the passive abilities of the other. (So, if one has Armor 5, they both have Armor 5 individually.)

floor.name: Oriana Apotheosis
floor.description: "Well fought, warriors of the Prime World. You have bested my champions, and now stand before me," a voice echoes as though from inside your thoughts. "There's no need to die in vain. Join me now, and I will give you powers beyond your wildest imagination, as well as dominion over the world you call home. Defy me, and I will erase your very existence from the slate of the universe. Now speak, will you fight, or will you yield?"

floor.name: Oriana Apotheosis
floor.description:
Oriana's Left and Right hands each perform an attack as well. Oriana's hands and face do not take up space, and players can occupy their spaces. Oriana's face and both hands are immobile.
Players may abandon the party and join Oriana permanently if they wish. These players win if the rest of the party loses. The battle ends as soon as Oriana's head is defeated.

attack.name: Solar Spire
attack.description:
Armor 5
Start: Pull the opponent with the lowest priority up to 3 spaces

attack.name: Zero Convergence
attack.description:
Stun Guard 4
Attacks at range 1 do not hit you

attack.name: Reversion
attack.description:
Stun Immunity
Power is equal to the damage the Monolith has taken this beat.

attack.name: Gate Flare
attack.description:
Stun Guard 4
Start: For each player, roll a die and pull the player that many spaces

attack.name: Seal Matrix
attack.description:
Stun Guard 4
Hit: Each hit opponent cannot hit you this beat.

attack.name: Microwave Beam
attack.description:
Stun Guard 6
X is nearest opponent's space.
Hit: +3 Power for each opponent in the target space

attack.name: Electroclaw
attack.description:
Armor 5
Before: Advance up to 2

attack.name: Nitro Breath Beam
attack.description:
Armor 6
Start: Retreat 3

attack.name: Link Surge
attack.description:
Stun Guard 4
Start: Advance as far as possible. X is all opponents you switched sides with this beat.

attack.name: Nyx Revision
attack.description:
Opponents at range 1,2, and 3 cannot hit you.
Start: Retreat as far as possible
End: Advance 4 spaces

attack.name: Nihil Buster
attack.description: Armor 4

attack.name: Protocol Zero
attack.description:
Reveal: Double the Power and Priority bonuses you gained during ante.
Before: Advance 3 spaces
After: Retreat 3 spaces

attack.name: Advance Primary
attack.description:
When you push opponents this beat, do 3 damage to them.
Before: Advance 1 space

attack.name: Advance Secondary
attack.description:
Armor 12
Before: Advance up to 2 spaces

attack.name: Kick
attack.description:
Stun Guard 3
Damage: Push all damaged opponents back as far as possible

attack.name: Steady Advance
attack.description: Stun Immunity

attack.name: Magnet Blade
attack.description:
Armor 8
Hit: Pull each hit opponent as far as possible

attack.name: Sword Beam
attack.description:
Stun Guard 6
X is the number of spaces to the left of you

attack.name: Zone Edge
attack.description:
Hit: The opponent is stunned.
End: Advance 4

attack.name: Burner Blade
attack.description:
Stun Guard 6
Before: Retreat up to 1
End: Advance 4 spaces

attack.name: Painforge
attack.description:
Stun Immunity
+4 Power each time you are hit this beat.
Before: Advance up to 2
End: Retreat as far as possible

attack.name: Skill Absorption
attack.description:
Armor 12
Hit: The opponent's played Base is removed from the game.
End: Advance as far as possible.

attack.name: Dynamic Force
attack.description:
Start: Advance 3 spaces
End: Retreat 3 spaces

attack.name: Worlds' Fair
attack.description:
Armor 7
Start: Retreat as far as possible
Hit: For each hit opponent, roll a die and pull him that many spaces

attack.name: Havoc Pulse
attack.description: Ignore Soak

attack.name: Nyx Alpha
attack.description:
Stun Guard 3
Opponents in range of this attack cannot move.

attack.name: Nyx Beta
attack.description:
Armor 3
Before: Push each adjacent opponent 2 spaces

attack.name: Nyx Gamma
attack.description: Soak 2

attack.name: Leading Light
attack.description: Hit: You have +1 Power per opponent hit for the rest of the beat

attack.name: Sunspot
attack.description:
Ignores Stun Guard
Only hits the closest un-stunned enemy in range.

attack.name: Tentacle Reel
attack.description: Hit: Push the opponent as far as possible

attack.name: Constriction
attack.description:
Stun Guard 3
Opponents in range of this attack cannot move

attack.name: Tentacle Snap
attack.description:
Armor 3
Before: Push each adjacent opponent 2 spaces

attack.name: Spike Shell
attack.description:
Armor 4
Each time an opponent attacls at range 1 or 2, he loses 4 life

attack.name: Impale
attack.description: Stun Guard 3

attack.name: Swipe
attack.description: Hit: Each hit opponent is stunned

attribute.name: Ambition
attribute.description: Oriana has +2 Priority while this hand lives.

attack.name: Mastery
attack.description: After: Oriana has +5 Power and Stun Guard 5

attack.name: Dominance
attack.description: After: Oriana has Armor 10

attack.name: Eternity
attack.description: After: Oriana regains 10 life

attribute.name: Power
attribute.description: Oriana has +2 Power while this hand lives.

attack.name: Oppression
attack.description: After: Opponents have -3 Power and lose all Stun Guard when they hit Oriana

attack.name: Control
attack.description: After: For each opponent, roll a die, then move the opponent that many spaces towards the farthest edge of the board.

attack.name: Seize
attack.description: After: All boosts to power are ignored for players this beat, and applied to Oriana instead

attack.name: Third Eye
attack.description:
X is Oriana's face and two adjacent spaces.
Hit: Remove the opponent's attack pair from the game

attack.name: Meteor Storm
attack.description:
Stun Immunity
X is all gray-colored spaces

attack.name: Astral Claws
attack.description:
Stun Immunity
X is the spaces occupied by and adjacent to living hands

attack.name: Black Hole
attack.description:
Armor 14
After a player activates an attack, he is moved directly to arena center.
X is the spaces occupied by and adjacent to Oriana's face

attack.name: Galaxy Crush
attack.description: X is far edges of the arena

attack.name: Hand of Fate
attack.description:
Stun Immunity
X is the spaces occupied by and adjacent to living hands
After: Restore defeated hands to full life. Lose 15 life per hand restored.
